title.rendered: In The Wild: Local Search Recipe: How to Track Local Analytics Using WordPress

content.rendered:
I am going to take a break from the Local Search Talk Series today because it is Search Engine Journal Thursday and my column on How to Track Local Analytics Using WordPress was published today. I decided to take an different spin on the article and write it as a recipe. More to amuse myself than anything, but it is well worth a read if you use wordpress and have a presence in Google Maps..or you enjoy a cheesy one liner on occasion. So, click the link above (or below) and let me know what you think of the article.

Mike Ramsey’s Local Search Recipe
